title: Did Supreme Court Nominee Barrett Say Women Shouldn’t Own Property?
subtitle: Amy Coney Barrett, a Catholic, is also affiliated with People of Praise, a "charismatic Christian community” whose teachings include women being subordinate to their husbands.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump’s Supreme Court nominee Judge Amy Coney Barrett said that women should not be able to own, buy, or sell property without the permission of their husband or a male relative.
